m_szDocSumamry: View All Posts I’ll start by saying this — there is no company in the world like Tesla Motors Inc ( TSLA ). It’s truly in a league of its own. No one makes sexy, sleek, safe electric cars like Elon Musk and his army of futurist nerds. But even that can’t keep crusty old auto industry codger General Motors ( GM ) from throwing its weight around the market. It can, and it is. General Motor’s 2017 Chevy Bolt, officially unveiled at the Consumer Electronics Show , plans to beat Tesla to the punch in one incredibly important respect — mass-production at an affordable price.
